scripts.help:
node -e "console.log('
üè• MediSaathi - Available Commands

Setup:
  npm run setup              - Complete setup (backend + frontend)
  npm run backend:setup      - Setup backend only
  npm run frontend:setup     - Setup frontend only

Run:
  npm run dev                - Run both backend and frontend
  npm run backend            - Run backend server
  npm run frontend:website   - Run website (Vite)
  npm run frontend:mobile    - Run mobile (Expo)

Utility:
  npm run clean              - Clean dependencies and caches
  npm run backend:install    - Reinstall backend dependencies
  npm run frontend:install   - Reinstall frontend dependencies
')"
scripts.setup: npm run backend:setup && npm run frontend:setup
scripts.backend:activate-and-install: cd backend && bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt --trusted-host pypi.org --trusted-host files.pythonhosted.org' || powershell -Command "& { .\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; pip install --upgrade pip; pip install -r requirements.txt --trusted-host pypi.org --trusted-host files.pythonhosted.org }"
scripts.dev: echo 'üöÄ Starting MediSaathi...' && echo 'üìù Run backend and frontend in separate terminals:' && echo '  Terminal 1: npm run backend' && echo '  Terminal 2: npm run frontend'
scripts.backend: cd backend && bash START_BACKEND.sh || powershell -Command "& { .\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5050 }"
scripts.clean: npm run backend:clean && npm run frontend:clean
scripts.backend:clean: bash -c 'cd backend && rm -rf venv __pycache__ app/__pycache__ app/routers/__pycache__' || powershell -Command "& { cd backend; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force venv,__pycache__,'app/__pycache__','app/routers/__pycache__' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }"
scripts.frontend:clean: bash -c 'cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules .expo package-lock.json' || powershell -Command "& { cd frontend; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules,.expo,package-lock.json -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }"
scripts.backend:install: cd backend && bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt --trusted-host pypi.org --trusted-host files.pythonhosted.org --force-reinstall' || powershell -Command "& { cd backend; .\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; pip install --upgrade pip; pip install -r requirements.txt --trusted-host pypi.org --trusted-host files.pythonhosted.org --force-reinstall }"
scripts.frontend:install: cd frontend && npm run clean && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
